name: Catto Boi: The Quest for the Frozen Tuna
name_original: Catto Boi: The Quest for the Frozen Tuna
description:
Join Catto on his biggest adventure yet - collect fragments of 6 rare gems to unlock the entrance to the fabled underground shrine where within lies the fabled Frozen Tuna. But what challenges will Catto face along, and perhaps, after his journey?

Can Catto's world be saved from corrupted tyrany once and for all?

There are multiple endings in this game depending on what decisions or mistakes you make. Be careful. The world of Catto is counting on you.

Warning: This game is not suitable for children under the age of 16 or those who are easily disturbed.

Join my community Discord!
discord.gg/E6ZuKH9

Join the subreddit if that's your thing!
